mapper.select: SELECT b.user_name username, a.id, 'online' status, b.user_photo avatar, b.company_id companyId, b.department_id departmentId, b.user_sign sign FROM sys_eve_user a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = b.user_id AND a.id = #{userId}
SELECT b.id, b.group_name groupname, b.group_img avatar, b.create_id createId FROM sys_talk_group_user a, sys_talk_group b WHERE a.group_id = b.id AND a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.state = '1'

SELECT b.id, b.`name` groupname, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS `online`, #{userId} thisUserId FROM sys_eve_user_staff a, company_department b, ( SELECT @rownum := 0 ) r WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.company_id = b.company_id

SELECT a.user_name username, b.id, 'offline' status, a.user_photo avatar, IFNULL(a.user_sign, '暂无签名') sign, a.company_id companyId, a.department_id departmentId, m.job_name jobName FROM sys_eve_user_staff a LEFT JOIN (SELECT o.user_id, p.job_name FROM sys_eve_user_staff o, company_job p WHERE o.job_id = p.id) m ON m.user_id = a.user_id, sys_eve_user b WHERE a.department_id = #{id} AND a.user_id = b.id AND a.state = '1' AND b.id != #{thisUserId} AND b.id != '0dc9dd4cd4d446ae9455215fe753c44e'
